title: Fort Sumter National Monument: Use Your GPS To Find Us!
body: Use Your GPS To Find Us!         Fort Sumter Visitor Education Center at Liberty Square NPS/Taormina  Fort Sumter by Ferry Charleston Ferries departing from the Fort Sumter Visitor Education Center at Liberty Square in Charleston: 340 Concord Street, Charleston, SC 29401 Parking  City Parking Garage: 24 Calhoun Street, Charleston, SC 29401  or limited metered street parking Mount Pleasant Ferries departing from Patriots Point in Mount Pleasant: 40 Patriots Point Road, Mount Pleasant, SC 29464    Fort Sumter by Private Boat There is no address for Fort Sumter Island. Use the coordinate set of your choice below: GPS: N 32 45.146 W 79 52.500 Latitude/Longitude: N32 45 08  W79 52 29 (32.752434)   (-79.87499)    Fort Moultrie and Park Headquarters Also the mailing address for all park sites: 1214 Middle Street, Sullivan's Island, SC 29482
